Description: On Rt. 643 East in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Belmont Rd; Turner Rd; Rt. 651E/W (Chesterfield County); Rt. 650N/S (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 142.6 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-664 South at mile marker 10.9 in the City of Suffolk, near Suffolk Shore, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer.
